LanguageData.HerbivoreFeeder.label: herbivore feeder
LanguageData.HerbivoreFeeder.description: An automated feeding system designed to dispense sustenance for herbivores. Cost more than a small feeder, but dispenses larger amounts of food.
LanguageData.HerbivoreFeederSmall.label: small herbivore feeder
LanguageData.HerbivoreFeederSmall.description: A small automated feeding system designed to dispense sustenance for herbivores. Cost less than a normal feeder, but dispenses smaller amounts of food.
